“Swap BTT on mobile device.”

The official site(https://wallet.bt.io/swap) does not support BTT swap on mobile. I have developed a BTT swap that works with the mobile Tron wallet.

  1. Open Tronlink on your deive. (Android/iOS)

  2. Go to the browser menu. (Android is called Discover menu)

  3. Visit swatbtt.com and connect tronlink

  4. Enter the quantity you want to swap and accept the transaction. (* Check the contract address. I do not compensate for your financial loss.)
